util.hh File Reference

Detailed Description

A header file that references all the other header files in the Util namespace. This allows you to include only this file and get all the functionality of the Util namespace. Conversly, you could include the specific util header files that you want to use.

Date:
Oct 14th, 2009 last edited: Oct 14th, 2009
Author:
Michael Sneddon

#include "constants/constants.hh"
#include "conversion/conversion.hh"
#include "rand/rand.hh"
#include "string/string.hh"
